review.reviewBody: My favourite parathas aside from my husband's grandma's parathas. The size of the paratha is generous and I move the carrot achar. I have also tried Makki Di Roti, saag and malai kofta and they were good too.

Goal Guppa Basket (35 Pieces) 
Everything was packaged amazingly!
I asked for my order to have extra water, and they provided me with more than enough water. Great service and taste!
The best food and family based service hands down ! Been coming here for many years and would give 10 stars if I could!
Food awesome yummy saag delicious stuffers parauntha amazing

The Best food i have everrrrrr had. 
Food quality-  Nop Notch
